# Dødelig Magic Items
## Overview
The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Dødelig|dødelig]] magic items introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---
## Governed Content
- [[Charm of Vital Inference]]
- [[Dødelig Bone Chime]]
- [[Dødelig Bone Token]]
- [[Ground Dødelig Remains]]
